Title: Larry David: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Actors: Jason Alexander, Larry Charles, Carol Leifer, Richard Lewis
Plot: Larry David, co-creator and co-writer with Jerry Seinfeld of the Seinfeld series, decides to make a come-back to stand-up comedy. His agent, Jeff Greene, has even more ambitious plans - make a TV special of the occasion, including showing the planning behind the show. This is that TV special. Sort of.
